subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: The former world welterweight champion Ricky Hatton of Britain will make his comeback, after three years of retirement, against the Ukrainian Vyacheslav Senchenko on Nov. 24.
snippet: The former world welterweight champion Ricky Hatton of Britain will make his comeback, after three years of retirement, against the Ukrainian Vyacheslav Senchenko on Nov. 24.
